86159.「カンダタさーん。\n <pc>が 手伝うみたいだぞー。:
Hey, Robbin' 'Ood! I think <pc>'s
gonna help you out.

86161.「ご苦労だったな ボラオ。\n ほれ 約束のアクロバットケーキだ。:
Splendid work, Barao. 'ere's your Acrobatic
Cake, just as promised!

86163.「さて 俺様の最強の子分 <pc>！\n 今回の仕事だが……:
Alright! <pc>, me strongest
'enchman! Regardin' this 'ere job...

86164.「ん？ 子分になった覚えはない……だと？\n うるせえ！ 俺様のカンダタ団は\n:
Huh? What's that? You're not my 'enchman...?
Ah, shut yer pie hole! I'm a little short-
staffed right now!

86165.「そもそも テメーが キラキラ大風車塔で\n 俺様の子分を やっつけたから\n:
And it's all thanks to you defeatin' my Merry
Man back at the windmill. Ya let him get
away!

86166.「だから テメーは 責任をとって\n 今日から 俺様の子分になれ！\n 文句ねえ:
So now you gotta take 'is place and be my
new Merry Man! You don't got a problem
with that, right?!<yesno><close>

86167.「うるせえ！ つべこべ言わずに\n 俺様の子分になれ！\n 文句ねえよな？ な！:
Pipe down! Stop yer whinin' and just be my
new Merry Man, won't ya? Well?!<yesno><close>

86168.「へへっ。命びろいしたな <pc>！\n どうしても断るってんなら\n この場で:
Heh, heh! Ya got guts, <pc>! If
you'd said no, I'd've socked ya right
here!

86169.<pc>は カンダタ団に 入団した！<me_71>:
<pc> is now a member of the
Robbin' 'Ood Gang!<me_71>

86170.「よし！ これからも よろしくなっ！\n 最強の子分 <pc>！:
Good! I'll be countin' on ya from 'ere!
<pc>, my best 'enchman!

86171.「さて……今回 テメーを呼び出した\n その理由を 教えてやろう。:
Okay, so...lemme tell ya why I called ya
over 'ere in the first place.

86173.「あの 空に浮かんでるお月様にゃあ\n とんでもねえ秘宝が眠ってるって 伝説があ:
There's this legend that says that moon
floatin' up there 'as some incredible
treasure!

86174.「というわけで テメーには\n 月へ行くために 協力してもらうぜっ！:
So that's why I'm gonna need yer 'elp to get
up there!

86175.「この間は キラキラ大風車塔のプロペラで\n 塔ごと 空を飛べねえかと試してみた:
I tried to use that big ol' windmill and see
if its big propeller would let it fly...but
that didn't seem to work.

86176.「だが！ 俺様は 新しい方法を見つけたのよ！\n その方法は…………:
But! I found somethin' else!
Wanna know what it is...?

86177.「<pc>。\n オルフェアの町の ビッグホルンへ来い！\n ……すべては それ:
Come to the Big 'orn in Orphea!
That's where the magic'll 'appen!

86178.「これから <pc>のことは\n カンダタ子分って 呼んでやるぞー。\n カンダ:
I'm gonna call you a Merry Man from now
on! Make sure to give it your all for
Robbin' 'Ood!

90701.「キラキラ大風車塔や この ビッグホルンなどを\n 設計した 偉大な建築家プロッ:
I am a noble, yet unemployed individual who hails from a prestigious lineage. I am a descendant of the great architect Proppe,
who crafted the Wondrous Windmill Tower and this Big Horn, among many other great creations.

90702.「コイツも 俺様の新しい子分よ！\n おい <pc>！\n 先輩として かわいが:
He's one o' my new Merry Men, too!
Oi, <pc>! Make sure to treat 'im
wiv kindness!

90704.「うるせえ！ 俺様が子分だと決めたんだ！\n テメーらは 死ぬまで 俺様の子分よ:
Zip it! I've decided that you're one o' me
Merry Men now, until the day ya die!
Got it?! So ya two better get along!

90705.「ううむ……少々 複雑ですが\n 仕事もなく ブラブラしているよりは\n たとえ:
Hmmm...it is a bit complicated. However,
having a job as a thief's lackey is much more
favorable than having no job at all.

90706.「<pc>さん 私のことは\n カンダタ子分Ｂと お呼びください。\n もちろん:
<pc>, if you would, please call me
Merry Man B. Of course, you will be
called Merry Man A!

90707.「さて……カンダタ親分さん。\n 私に 頼みとは いったいなんでしょう？:
So, Mr. Robbin' 'Ood...
What exactly is it that you need me for?

90708.「おう。そうそう ソレが本題よ。\n テメーを子分にしたのは\n ビッグホルンの:
Oh, right-o. Gotta tell ya my plan. I made ya
one o' my Merry Men so you can blow that
'orn over there even stronger!

90709.「ホルンの出力を？\n ……はぁ まあ 無職であるとはいえ\n ウデきき建築士の:
Blow the horn more strongly? Heh...
Well, for an unemployed yet well-versed
architect like myself, it's quite simple.

90710.「それなら 話が早ぇや！\n ぱぱぱっと やってくんな！:
Well then, start doin'! It should be a piece
o' cake!

90711.「できました！\n 無職ながら ウデきき建築士の私が\n ホルンの出力を操作して:
And done! I may be unemployed, but I'm still
quite the skilled architect! I've managed to
double the horn's output strength!

90712.「よーし でかしたっ！\n それじゃ さっそく乗り込むとするか！: Nice goin'! Come on, let's get a move on!

90715.「わあっ！ カンダタ親分さん！\n し しっかりしてください！！:
Aaah!! Mr. Robbin' 'Ood! A...are you all
right?!

90716.「おいっ ペリポン！！\n ちっとも 出力が上がってねえじゃねえか！\n どこが:
Oi, Peripon! What's the meanin' o' this?
I can blow stronger bubbles than that!
And you call yerself an architect?!

90717.「わあっ 乱暴はよしてください！\n 助けてください カンダタ子分Ａさん！:
Waahh! Please don't get violent!
Assist me, Merry Man A!

90718.「うるせえ！ 月の秘宝を手に入れるために\n 俺様は 月に飛んで行きてえんだ！\:
Quiet! All I wants to do is fly to the moon to
get that treasure! Just hurry up an' make
it happen!!

90720.「ええ～っ！？\n あの 空に浮かぶ お月様にですか！？:
Whaaaat?! You mean the one floating up in
the sky? THAT moon?!

90721.「……それならそうと 最初に言ってください。\n 今の ビッグホルンでは無理です:
...you should've said so from the beginning.
The Big Horn as it is now will never have
enough power. It'll need a complete remodel.

90722.「なんだと！？\n おう くわしく話してみな！: Whad'ya just say?! Out wiv it!

90723.「う～む……その ガンガン電池ってので\n この ビッグホルンの出力を\n 爆発:
Mmmhmm...so what yer tellin' me is we can use
this "Boomin' Battery" to make the 'orn even
more powerful?

90724.「はい。無職の私の 偉大なる先祖が作った\n キラキラ大風車塔・１０の秘密の ひ:
Indeed. It's one of the ten secrets of the Wondrous Windmill Tower, built by none other than my amazingly unemployed
ancestor. That is the Booming Battery.

90725.「あとの ９つも なかなか素晴らしい\n 驚きに満ちているんですよ！\n たとえ:
And the other nine are just full of surprises!
For example, there's...

90726.「そっちの話は どうでもいい。\n で ガンガン電池は どこにあるんだ！？:
I don't give a rat's arse about any o' that!
Where can we find the Boomin' Battery?!

90727.「親分さんが持ってきた古文書によれば……\n キラキラ大風車塔の 儀式の間。\n:
According to this manuscript that you brought...it's in the Ritual Hall inside the windmill. It seems it's hidden in one of the
lamps on the wall.

90728.「よし！ <pc>！\n テメーの出番だぜ！ ガンガン電池を\n キラキラ大風車:
Awright! Yer up, <pc>! Go to the
Wondrous Windmill Tower and get that
Boomin' Battery!

90729.「わあっ 待ってください！\n なにしろ ガンガン電池は貴重なものですから\n:
Wait just a second! It says here the Booming
Battery is very valuable, so it's locked away!

90731.「なんだあ？ カギに心当たりがあるのか！\n なら さっさと渡すのが 身のためだ:
What was that? You say ya know what the key
is? Spit it out!

90732.「……風車のカギは 無職の私の偉大な祖先\n 建築士プロッペから 受け継がれ\n:
The Windmill Key was passed down to me by my amazingly unemployed ancestor Proppe. It's been a treasured heirloom of my family for
many generations.

90733.「しかし……つい先日 その風車のカギを\n ある盗賊に 盗まれてしまったんです。:
But...just the other day...the key was stolen
by a no-good thief!

90734.「なにぃ！？ 俺様の風車のカギを盗んだ\n けしからん盗賊が いるだと！？\n:
What's this now?! There's a thief out there
who tinks they can just steal MY Windmill
Key?! Who is this big-shot thief?!

90735.「……忘れもしない アイツです！\n 悪名高き 盗賊ラゴスこそが\n 風車のカギ:
I'll never forget him...! The one who stole
the key is none other than the notorious
thief Lagos!

90736.「ふん……ラゴスか。\n なつかしい名前を 聞いたもんだぜ。\n だが アイツの:
Hmm...Lagos, was it? Haven't 'eard that name
in awhile. But I might know where he's 'idin'.

90737.「ドワチャッカ大陸 ボロヌス溶岩流の東\n ……最果ての地下遺跡の奥に\n おそ:
East o' the Boronus Lava Flow in Dwachakka...
There's a place called the Deepest Depths.
Lagos's probably 'idin' in there.

90740.「最果ての地下遺跡の奥に 着いたら\n そのノートに書かれた文章を 読み上げろ！:
When ya reach the bottom o' the Deepest
Depths, make sure ya start yappin' what's
written in that notebook!

90741.「<pc>！\n テメーは 俺様の最強の子分だ。\n 必ず ラゴスから 風車のカ:
Yer my strongest 'enchman!
Ya gotta get that key back from that Lagos
punk!

90742.「風車のカギを 手に入れたら\n キラキラ大風車塔に 集合だぞ！！:
When ya get it, meet us at the Wondrous
Windmill Tower!

90744.「そっ それは 昔 僕が作った詩！？\n どうして 知ってるんだ……！:
T...that's a poem I wrote a long time ago!
How the heck do you know it...?!

90745.「僕の秘密を 知られたからには\n 生かして帰すわけに いかない。\n ……覚悟:
Now that you know my secret, I can't let you
leave alive! Prepare to die!!

90746.「君……なかなか やるな。\n ここまで 僕を追い詰めるとは。:
Y...you're pretty good to push me even
this far.

90747.「でも いったい どこで\n 僕が若い頃に作った\n 詩のノートを 手に入れたん:
But where the heck did you even get that?
That's a notebook I wrote poems in when I
was young.

90748.<cs_pchero>は 盗賊ラゴスに\nカンダタから 漆黒のノートをもらった\:
<cs_pchero> explained to Lagos that
Robbin' 'Ood had given them the notebook!

90749.「くっ……。僕の過去を\n カンダタに 知られてしまっていたなんて……。\n 恥:
Guh... Unbelievable that he knows all about
my past... Now I'm too embarrassed to steal
anything at all!

90750.「しかし……そうか。僕が盗んだ 風車のカギを\n 取り戻すために 来たんだね。\:
But...okay, I get it. You came here to get
back that Windmill Key I stole, right? I can't
just give it you for nothing, though.

90751.「その 漆黒のノートと交換なら\n 風車のカギを 返してもいい。\n どうだい？:
If you give me that notebook, I'll give you
the key. Deal?

90752.盗賊ラゴスに 漆黒のノートを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give the Jet-Black Notebook to Lagos?<yesno><close>

90753.「い いくら暴力をふるわれたって\n 僕は 屈しないからな！\n 風車のカギは:
N-no matter how much you thrash me, I won't
give into your violent ways! The key for the
notebook, that's the deal!!

90754.<cs_pchero>は 漆黒のノートを渡し\n風車のカギ（だいじなもの）を 手:
<cs_pchero> handed over the
the Jet-Black Notebook and received
the Windmill Key (Key Item)!<me_60>

90755.「ああ……懐かしいなあ。\n この手触り この紙の匂い。\n カンダタのヤツ ど:
Ahh...I've missed this so much. The texture,
the smell of the paper... Where did that
Robbin' 'Ood rascal even find this...?

90756.「ん？ 君 まだいたのかい？\n 風車のカギを 渡したんだから\n さっさと キ:
Huh? You're still here? I gave you the key, so
you should skedaddle over to the Windmill,
don't you think?

90757.「そのカギを キラキラ大風車塔 儀式の間の\n 壁にある ランプのひとつに使えば:
If you use that key on one of the wall lamps
in the Ritual Hall, you should be able to
find a Booming Battery.

90758.「それじゃ 僕はこれで！\n 僕が ここの暗闇に 隠れてることは\n くれぐれも:
Well, that's all from me! Please don't tell
anyone that I'm hiding here!

90759.「おう！ そいつが ガンガン電池か。\n でかしたぜっ <pc>！:
Ohh! That's the Boomin' Battery!
Ya found it!

90760.「ペリポン！ この ガンガン電池で\n さっそく ビッグホルンを改造しろ！\n:
Peripon! I want ya to use that Boomin' Battery
to make that horn just as boomin'! Ya got
five minutes!!

90761.「わあっ 待ってください！\n いくら無職で 時間があり余っているとはいえ\n:
Wah! Wait just a moment! Despite having a lot of free time as an unemployed individual, I still can't do it in five minutes. I'll need
at least fifteen...

90763.「なんでえ もったいつけんじゃねえ！\n １０分以内なら 待ってやるぜ！！:
Whaddya doin' just standin' around?!
Fine! Ya got ten minutes!

90764.「いや……残念ながら\n １０分どころか 当分の間\n ビッグホルンの改造は ム:
No...unfortunately it looks like I won't be
able to modify the Big Horn in the foreseeable
future at all, let alone ten minutes...

90766.「この ガンガン電池は キラキラ大風車塔の\n 回転を利用し 電力を貯めるのです:
This Booming Battery uses the rotation of the
windmill to store energy. But by the looks of
it, it hasn't been fully charged yet.

90767.「無職の私には わかります……。\n まだ ガンガン電池は 本気を出していない。:
As one who is unemployed, I completely
understand its plight... The battery has
yet to reach its full potential.

90768.「ちっ。こんなトコで 足止めかよ！\n 充電が終わるのは いつなんだ？:
Tch... So yer sayin' we're stuck? When's it
gonna finish charging?

90769.「はっきりとは わかりません。\n 何しろ 古い機械ですので\n すぐには 無理:
I don't know for sure. It is an old machine,
after all. It's hard to say...

90770.「ですが 幸運にも 私は無職です！\n 毎日…… いや １日に５回だって\n 様:
But fortunately for you, I am unemployed!
I'll check on it once...no, five times every
day!

90771.「充電が終わったらすぐ\n カンダタ親分さんに ご連絡しましょう。\n どうか:
I'll contact you as soon as it finishes
charging. Please be patient until then.

90772.「しょうがねえ 待っててやらあ。\n ちくしょう！\n ようやく 月に行けると思:
Guess there ain't much I can do, then...
Dang it! I thought I was finally goin' to
the moon...

90773.「それはそうと <pc>！\n よくぞ 盗賊ラゴスから \n 風車のカギを ブン:
By the way, <pc>!
Nice work swipin' that key from that
wannabe thief Lagos!

90774.「さすがは 俺様の 最強の子分だぜ。\n これは 今回の礼だ。受け取りな！:
I 'ad no doubt that you'd get it. You are my
best mate, after all! 'ere, I want ya to 'ave
this! Take it!

90775.「ガンガン電池の 充電が終わったら\n テメーにも 連絡してやる。:
I'll give ya an 'oller when the battery's
done gettin' all charged up.

91088.「あ どうも。はじめまして。\n あなたが カンダタ子分さんですか。\n 私 ペ:
Ah, greetings. It's a pleasure to meet you.
So you are Robbin' 'Ood's Merry Man, I
presume? My name is Peripon.

91875.辺りには 誰もいないようだ……。: There doesn't seem to be anyone here...

91876.<cs_pchero>は カンダタにもらった\n漆黒のノートの文章を 読み上げた:
<cs_pchero> reads out the words
written inside the Jet-Black Notebook!

91877.宿命……神と悪魔に引き裂かれし自我。\n盗みという快楽……背徳の美酒に魅せられし:
Destined fate, betwixt gods and hell's gate, Lured by theft's thrill, the wine doth sate, Nightly dance, the body's soul's fate,
Guided by vice, sin's dark ornate.

91878.甘き罪……呼び醒まされる血が\n漆黒の闇に罪人を微笑ませ……宿業が刻まれる！！\:
Sweet sin calls forth blood in silent night, Darkest dark, smiles bloom in sin's delight, Deeds of the past carved in eternal sight!
Tonight! Tonight! Tonight...!

97080.「それこそが 月の秘宝！！\n そいつを手に入れることが 俺様の夢だからだ！:
That's what the Treasure o' the Moon is!
And it's my dream to get me 'ands on it!

97081.「アイツは どうせ 暗闇に潜んでやがる。\n だが ノートの文章を 読み上げれば:
He's probably lurkin' around, hidin'
somewhere. But if ya read that notebook, he's
sure to come runnin'.

97082.「そしたら 月の秘宝を 手に入れるため\n すぐに 月へと出発だ！\n 呼ばれた:
Then we'll make our way to the moon and get
that treasure! An' no draggin' yer feet when I
call ya!
